title: Halloween bard skin
body: i think this halloween it would be a good time to release  an amazing bard skin cause bard hasnt got many skins or has any really good ones

replies.body: or they can release a skin for shaco or someone like him, the guy screams halloween. Hes a scary jester

Compared to some champions he has been really lucky to get two skins after release. Also, Snow Day Bard is a really well made skin.

A Halloween skin would go well with him though.
